content.question: ​For the polynomial function <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math>, <math alttext="limit as x rightwards arrow negative infinity of g open parentheses x close parentheses equals negative infinity"><munder><mi>lim</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></munder><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo></math>. Which of the following expressions could define <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="negative 5 x minus 2 x to the power of 4"><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></math>
​<math alttext="negative 5 x squared minus 2 x to the power of 7"><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>7</mn></msup></math>
​<math alttext="negative 9000 x minus x to the power of 5 over 5"><mo>-</mo><mn>9000</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>5</mn></msup><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math>
​<math alttext="negative x cubed plus 2 x to the power of 4"><mo>-</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="negative 5 x minus 2 x to the power of 4"><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
